title: GIVE US OPTIONAL TWO FACTOR AUTHENTICATION!!! IT HAS BEEN 10 YEARS!!!
body: I WANT MY ACCOUNT MORE SECURE! I WANT IT TO BE IMPOSSIBLE TO LOG IN WITHOUT A TEXT TO MY PHONE IF I CHOOSE TO MAKE IT THAT WAY. NO NEED TO FOCE IT ON PEOPLE WHO DONT CARE BUT IT SHOULD BE AN OPTION WE ARE LIVING IN 2020.
